WorkItem.ClosedComment: Fixed, your aura (if you have the talent) and the Buff one cannot overlap anymore. The Buff will be checkable but it won't do anything until you take the talent point out
WorkItem.Description:
Trueshot Aura seems to be applied twice (or differently?) if you have the talent and select the buff.
Â 
Hunter DPS without talent or buff = 6133
With talent, no buff = 6583
With buff, no talent = 6714
With both = 6780

Comments.Message:
Some thoughts when looking at the code.
In the code there is code to handle buffs from hunters mark other than our "own".
Especially one line is interesting... 
            calculatedStats.apFromGear -= apFromHuntersMarkDebuff;

Since the apFromGear seem to include any ap from buffs already, a similar subtraction might be necessary for the true shot aura.
However, if that was the only tweak needed, then the cases (with talent, no buff) and (no talent, with buff) should provide the same result... or?
